item.title: Shopmaking
item.dc:creator: @Stiflex Stiflex
item.description:
@Stiflex wrote:

hi, i need some help on making shops’ whit the shop maker,
there are 3 things to paste in many places
[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 541) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 hardcore_stuff 1 1 11700 10000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
541 3214 3426 0 0 0 0 0 1 test’s_hardcore_stuff
ok then ive done whit the autospawn the shops.cfg
but i cant seem to get it how to do it in class.java
i know the place where to paste but after i paste i get an error
Please some one help me, I know its a simple thing to do but i cant do it
here’s the error:
client.java:6856: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (NPCID == 541) {
^
1 error
Your Server is Ready to Run.
Press any key to continue . . .
WHAT TO DO PLEASE TELL ME

Read full topic
